MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the DD6 postcode area of Tayport. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have been working on site and in order to safely carry out a permanent repair to our underground cable network, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:10pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:50pm on Friday, 15th January 2021
